thread.title: The 10 best things to do in Miami
thread.title_full: The 10 best things to do in Miami

title: The 10 best things to do in Miami
text:
The 10 best things to do in Miami The 10 best things to do in Miami ROMANTIC beaches, amazing party scene and shopping heaven: Miami is the perfect destination for an active summer holiday. PUBLISHED: PUBLISHED: 00:01, Sat, Aug 1, 2015 SAT MAG Enjoy the fabulous night life in Miami 
1. Sip a margarita at classic Miami hotel bars such as the Delano and Fontainebleau. 
2. Take a 90-minute Art Deco District walking tour. See mdpl.org . 
3. Enjoy breakfast at Ocean Drive’s famous News Café. 
4. Watch the sunset at the island’s southern tip, South Pointe Park. 
5. Visit the Vizcaya Museum and Gardens, a lavish Renaissance-style villa housing priceless art. SAT MAG Sip a margarita at classic Miami hotel bars such as the Delano and Fontainebleau 
6. Shop ’til you drop at Lincoln Road Mall or swanky Bal Harbour. 
7. Catch a concert by the New World Symphony orchestra. 
8. Stroll down Española Way, a charming Mediterranean-inspired area of shops and restaurants. 
9. Hire a bike or Segway and join Miamians exercising on Ocean Drive’s famous boardwalk. 
10. Order crab cakes and Key lime pie at Joe’s Stone Crab, a Miami Beach institution. Related articles
